name: Witch Hunter
description:
This game was made for the Unreal Engine November 2015 game jam. The theme was "Desperate Diseases Require Dangerous Remedies".

The game is based on medieval witch hunting techniques and jokes about them. You go around as a witch hunter looking to find the most likely witch of any one village and then burn them at the stake.

This is an old project reuploaded to itch.io to have all my game jam games conveniently in one place. There are no plans to continue development.
